description:
As Kakashi safely releases Sasuke from the spell, Orochimaru suddenly shows up. Orochimaru expresses his desire for the power of Sharingan that the Uchiha clan holds in order to fulfill his ambitions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakashi und Orochimaru: Von Angesicht zu Angesicht
